conspire:Boomerang.NAME: Boomerang
DESCRIPTIONS: Place the first #yAttack card you play each turn on top of your draw pile.

conspire:DecoderRing.NAME: Decoder Ring
conspire:DecoderRing.FLAVOR: Up, up, down, down, left, right, left, right, B, A.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play #b3 #yAttack cards, then #b2 #ySkill cards, then #b2 #yAttacks cards, then #b1 #ySkill card, deal #b
NL (Play #b2 #yAttack cards, then #b2 #ySkill cards, then #b2 #yAttack, then #b1 #ySkill card cards to trigger)
NL (Play #b1 #yAttack card, then #b2 #ySkill cards, then #b2 #yAttack, then #b1 #ySkill card cards to trigger)
NL (Play #b2 #ySkill cards, then #b2 #yAttack cards, then #b1 #ySkill card to trigger)
NL (Play #b1 #ySkill card, then #b2 #yAttack cards, then #b1 #ySkill card to trigger)
NL (Play #b2 #yAttack cards, then #b1 #ySkill card to trigger)
NL (Play #b1 #yAttack card, then #b1 #ySkill card to trigger)

conspire:RoyalGoblet.NAME: Royal Goblet
conspire:RoyalGoblet.FLAVOR: Fit to serve a king. Or maybe made from cheap plastic.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. NL Draw #b1 fewer card each turn.

conspire:SeveredTorchhead.NAME: Severed Torchhead
conspire:SeveredTorchhead.FLAVOR: The flame has died, so the owner will not miss it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. NL Whenever you play an #yAttack card, lose #b1 #yStrength for the turn. NL Whenever you play a #ySkill card lose #b1 #yDexterity for the turn.

conspire:SlowCooker.NAME: Slow Cooker
conspire:SlowCooker.FLAVOR: Allows you to prepare a hearty spire-stew. Not for the impatient.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. NL On the first turn of combat lose 2 Energy instead.
